text.div:
DEX mapping language mime types

The list of mime types that identify mapping languages supported by DEX.

Copyright Statement: Mime types have no IP restrictions

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:ietf:bcp:13
    CodeDisplay
    application/sparql-results+xmlSPARQL
    application/sqlSQL
    application/xqueryX-Query

name: DEX mapping language mime types
publisher: Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT
description: The list of mime types that identify mapping languages supported by DEX.
copyright: Mime types have no IP restrictions
